entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
